body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is James Brown and I'm a customer service agent at ABC Car Dealership. May I ask for your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi James, my name is Olivia Harris.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Olivia. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five six seven eight nine zero one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Olivia. Can you also share with me your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is oliviaharris@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Olivia. Is there anything else you would like to share with me today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling nervous about the pricing. Can you help me understand it better?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Olivia. Let's go over the pricing details together. Thank you for reaching out and sharing your concerns. I appreciate your time. If you have any more questions, please don't hesitate to ask. Have a wonderful day, Olivia!
